demo.util

Class DemoUtil

    • Method Detail

      • initDemos

        public static void initDemos()
        Perform some initial setup to allow the demos to work.

      • initDemos

        public static void initDemos(java.lang.String arg)
        Perform some initial setup to allow the demos to work.
        Parameters:
        arg - "1" for installing IAIK provider by calling Security.insertProviderAt(new IAIK(), 1); "2" for installing IAIK provider by calling Security.insertProviderAt(new IAIK(), 2); in any other case the IAIK provider is installed by calling IAIK.addAsProvider(true)

      • addIaikProvider

        public static void addIaikProvider(java.lang.String arg)
        Adds the IAIK provider.
        Parameters:
        arg - "1" for installing IAIK provider by calling Security.insertProviderAt(new IAIK(), 1); "2" for installing IAIK provider by calling Security.insertProviderAt(new IAIK(), 2); in any other case the IAIK provider is installed by calling IAIK.addAsProvider(true)

      • waitKey

        public static void waitKey()
        Wait for the user to press the return key on System.in.
